<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[The Lake](/Articles.aspx?ID=74)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 68</row>

There's something in the water. Explore the eerie shores and frigid depths of the Lake of Mists and Veils!
name: The Lake
